plot: After a long wait, Alexandra finally gets a heart from an organ donor. At the same time, Paul loses Anna, the love of his life, in a car accident. With Anna's heart, Alexandre gets a new lease of life.
title: Zwei
plot_es: After a long wait, Alexandra finally gets a heart from an organ donor. At the same time, Paul loses Anna, the love of his life, in a car accident. With Anna's heart, Alexandre gets a new lease of life.
